channel.title: Help me wit playing on downloaded server
channel.description:
i downloaded the moparscape client...then i dl a server (umairscape) but i dont know how i could play on that server...and yes im new to this
plz help ty

item.title: Help me wit playing on downloaded server

item.source: Help me wit playing on downloaded server

item.title: Help me wit playing on downloaded server
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

Alright, First off, You are going to find it A LOT quicker for people to understand you if you actually TRY to talk some english. Tlk lk dis, people might leave, cause most of the time they can’t understand people who talk like that. Also, after asking a question, don’t immediately get offline, stick around a little bit. Also, read some guides.

Alright, Step One, Go to your server folder, and run server.bat or something along those lines. Now your server is started.

Step Two, Open your client, which would be MoparScape.jar

Step Three, There is a place for an IP, type 127.0.0.1

Step Four, Fill in your username and password.

Step Five, Click the Join server.

Now your in, to get your friends in, look at some port forwarding guides. Do NOT use hamachi. People can access your computer, and can be very dangerous to your information.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me wit playing on downloaded server
